summary: This document contains policy guidance directives for Cuban intelligence representatives in Haiti, prepared by the General Directorate of Intelligence (DGI). It outlines priorities and important areas of focus for intelligence gathering, including plans of aggression against Cuba, progressive political forces, attitudes towards the Cuban Revolution, and strategic information. It also covers topics such as relations with the United States, internal politics of Haiti, and the condition of the national economy.
title: Policy Guidance Directives for Cuban Intelligence Representatives in Haiti
